00010 #ifndef _STLUTILS_H__

00013 #include "platform/platform.h"

00016 // guid hashing and comparing
00018 
00019 #if defined(_SF_GUID_H__)
00020 
00021 namespace module
00022 {
00024 
00025     struct guid_hash
00026     {
00027         size_t operator() (const guid& g) const
00028         {
00029             unsigned long val;
00030             val = g.data1 ^ g.data2 ^ g.data3;
00031             for(int i = 0; i < 8; i += sizeof(unsigned long))
00032                 val ^= (unsigned long)g.data4[i];
00033             return size_t(val);
00034         }
00035     };
00036 } // namespace
00037 
00038 #endif
00039

00042 namespace stl

00046 
00047         struct hash_ptr
00048         {
00049                 size_t operator()(void* p) const { return (size_t)p; }
00050         };
00051 
00053 
00054         template<class T = module::IUnknown>
00055         struct fn_release
00056         {
00057                 void operator()(T *itf) const { itf->Release(); }
00058         };
00059 
00061 
00062         template<class T>
00063         struct fn_delete
00064         {
00065                 void operator()(T *ptr) const { delete ptr; }
00066                 void operator()(T &ref) const { delete &ref; }
00067         };
00068 
00070 
00071 }
